column4: Tesla shifts to Intel from Nvidia for infotainment: Bloomberg
column5: The giant information and entertainment screens in Tesla Inc's cars will now be powered by chipmaker Intel Corp after the electric carmaker replaced Nvidia Corp for that function  Bloomberg reported.

column4: Tesla shifts to Intel from Nvidia for infotainment - Bloomberg
column5: Sept 26 The giant information and entertainment screens in Tesla Inc's cars will now be powered by chipmaker Intel Corp after the electric carmaker replaced Nvidia Corp for that function  Bloomberg reported.

column4: Tesla's stock sputters as signs of competition increase
column5: SAN FRANCISCO Shares of Tesla Inc  remained in a correction on Tuesday after a billionaire British inventor announced plans for his own electric vehicles  taking the shine off an analyst prediction that Tesla's cars would be commonplace within two years.

column4: UPDATE 1-Tesla's stock sputters as  signs of competition increase
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  Sept 26 Shares of Tesla Inc remained in a correction on Tuesday after a billionaire British inventor announced plans for his own electric vehicles  taking the shine off an analyst prediction that Tesla's cars would be commonplace within two years.

column4: Tesla shares rebound while signs of competition increase
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  Sept 26 Shares of Tesla Inc rebounded from a correction on Tuesday after an analyst predicted its electric cars would become commonplace within two years and a billionaire UK inventor announced plans for his own electric vehicles.

column4: Chinese drop investment in maps firm HERE after U.S. resistance
column5: FRANKFURT A Chinese-led group has withdrawn its offer to buy a stake in German carmaker-backed mapping company HERE after it failed to win approval from a U.S. national security oversight board.

column4: UPDATE 2-Chinese drop investment in maps firm HERE after U.S resistance
